p: The first question in this study sought to determine the concept of community flood resilience in the context of Jakarta through understanding its desirable characteristics and influential barriers. As discussed earlier, each setting is unique and there is no ‘one size fits all’ approach for community resilience building, so community resilience building has to be tailored accordingly [ 100]. The authors have discussed the top three desirables and top three barriers in achieving community resilience to flood risks in Jakarta, from the above-mentioned options presented to the survey respondents.
